thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Kristian Paolo Torres
thread.title_full: FlightNetwork.com reviewed by Kristian Paolo Torres

author: Kristian Paolo Torres
title: Kristian Paolo Torres
text: I thought had a good experience with FlightNetwork; the prices are very good and cheapest I could find anywhere. UNFORTUNATELY, when I checked by credit card bill, I was charged 24.90 canadian dollars per person!!! Why were there hidden charges?? When I was booking, it never mentioned of the additional charges! I am so disappointed. Avoid Flight Network!
